WorkItem.ClosedComment: Add a check to  "Security Bulletin ID", "Kb Article ID", "More Info URL" and "Support URL" to filter out too long input.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

i fill in Security Bulletin ID a URL: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2847140 ENTER all Steps, after klick on Publish a Unhandled Execption come up. See Screenshots.

Winfried
WorkItem.Summary: WPP crash if in Security Bulletin ID Text

Comments.Message:
Hi Winfried, this happen because you put an URL instead of a __bulletin ID__
This field is restrict by Wsus to 15 characters. I will add a check to this form to reject too long data.

> I will add a check to this form to reject too long data.

This is exact what i want. ;)

Can you pls check if other fields too, if there is it possible to fill in too long or wrong data?

Thanks.
Winfried
